about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: Driving more slowly than surrounding traffic is:

about.name: Driving more slowly than surrounding traffic is:

hasPart.assesses: Driving more slowly than surrounding traffic is: | Driving more slowly than surrounding traffic is: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Driving more slowly than other traffic can be dangerous. Drivers behind you may become impatient and will be tempted to take dangerous risks to pass you.

suggestedAnswer.text: A good idea if the weather is bad.

comment.text: A good idea if the weather is bad.

suggestedAnswer.text: Appropriate if you don’t know the speed limit.

comment.text: Appropriate if you don’t know the speed limit.

suggestedAnswer.text: Often a hazard because other drivers may become frustrated and try to pass you.

comment.text: Often a hazard because other drivers may become frustrated and try to pass you.

acceptedAnswer.text: Often a hazard because other drivers may become frustrated and try to pass you.

comment.text: Often a hazard because other drivers may become frustrated and try to pass you.

answerExplanation.text: Driving more slowly than other traffic can be dangerous. Drivers behind you may become impatient and will be tempted to take dangerous risks to pass you.

comment.text: Driving more slowly than surrounding traffic is: | Driving more slowly than other traffic can be dangerous. Drivers behind you may become impatient and will be tempted to take dangerous risks to pass you.

hasPart.name: Motorcycles, scooters, and mopeds are not easy to see; therefore, you should:

about.name: Motorcycles, scooters, and mopeds are not easy to see; therefore, you should:

hasPart.assesses: Motorcycles, scooters, and mopeds are not easy to see; therefore, you should: | Motorcycles, scooters, and mopeds are not easy to see; therefore, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Motorcycles can be easily hidden in a vehicle’s blind spot or missed in a quick look due to their small size. Drivers of cars must always be alert and looking for motorcycles, mopeds, and scooters.

comment.text: Slow down when driving.
Make constant visual checks.

suggestedAnswer.text: Share a lane with a motorcycle.

comment.text: Share a lane with a motorcycle.
Make constant visual checks.

answerExplanation.text: Motorcycles can be easily hidden in a vehicle’s blind spot or missed in a quick look due to their small size. Drivers of cars must always be alert and looking for motorcycles, mopeds, and scooters.

comment.text: Motorcycles, scooters, and mopeds are not easy to see; therefore, you should: | Motorcycles can be easily hidden in a vehicle’s blind spot or missed in a quick look due to their small size. Drivers of cars must always be alert and looking for motorcycles, mopeds, and scooters.

hasPart.name: If it is necessary to make an emergency stop while driving on an interstate, you should:

about.name: If it is necessary to make an emergency stop while driving on an interstate, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If it is necessary to make an emergency stop while driving on an interstate, you should: | If it is necessary to make an emergency stop while driving on an interstate, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you must stop on the shoulder of the interstate or highway, turn on your emergency flashers to warn other drivers and stay inside your vehicle, if you can. The extremely high speed of traffic makes standing or walking along an interstate highway very dangerous.

suggestedAnswer.text: Sound your horn at passing cars to get their attention.

comment.text: Sound your horn at passing cars to get their attention.

suggestedAnswer.text: Get out of your vehicle and flag down the first vehicle that passes.

comment.text: Get out of your vehicle and flag down the first vehicle that passes.

suggestedAnswer.text: Pull off the road, turn on your emergency flashers, and stay in your vehicle, if you can.

comment.text: Pull off the road, turn on your emergency flashers, and stay in your vehicle, if you can.

acceptedAnswer.text: Pull off the road, turn on your emergency flashers, and stay in your vehicle, if you can.

comment.text: Pull off the road, turn on your emergency flashers, and stay in your vehicle, if you can.

answerExplanation.text: If you must stop on the shoulder of the interstate or highway, turn on your emergency flashers to warn other drivers and stay inside your vehicle, if you can. The extremely high speed of traffic makes standing or walking along an interstate highway very dangerous.

comment.text: If it is necessary to make an emergency stop while driving on an interstate, you should: | If you must stop on the shoulder of the interstate or highway, turn on your emergency flashers to warn other drivers and stay inside your vehicle, if you can. The extremely high speed of traffic makes standing or walking along an interstate highway very dangerous.

hasPart.name: This sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This sign means: | This sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign warns that you are leaving a separated one-way highway and will soon be driving on a two-way highway.

comment.text: Four-lane traffic ahead.
Divided highway ahead.
Two-way traffic ahead.
Two-way traffic ahead.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign warns that you are leaving a separated one-way highway and will soon be driving on a two-way highway.

comment.text: This sign means: | Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign warns that you are leaving a separated one-way highway and will soon be driving on a two-way highway.

hasPart.name: You are driving in the far right lane of a four-lane freeway and notice thick broken white lines on the left side of your lane. You are driving in:

about.name: You are driving in the far right lane of a four-lane freeway and notice thick broken white lines on the left side of your lane. You are driving in:

hasPart.assesses: You are driving in the far right lane of a four-lane freeway and notice thick broken white lines on the left side of your lane. You are driving in: | You are driving in the far right lane of a four-lane freeway and notice thick broken white lines on the left side of your lane. You are driving in: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Freeway lanes that are ending will usually be marked by large broken lines painted on the pavement. If you are driving in a lane marked with these broken lines, be prepared to exit the freeway or for the lane to end.

suggestedAnswer.text: The carpool lane and must merge into the next lane.

comment.text: The carpool lane and must merge into the next lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: A special lane for slow-moving vehicles.

comment.text: A special lane for slow-moving vehicles.
An exit lane.
An exit lane.

answerExplanation.text: Freeway lanes that are ending will usually be marked by large broken lines painted on the pavement. If you are driving in a lane marked with these broken lines, be prepared to exit the freeway or for the lane to end.

comment.text: You are driving in the far right lane of a four-lane freeway and notice thick broken white lines on the left side of your lane. You are driving in: | Freeway lanes that are ending will usually be marked by large broken lines painted on the pavement. If you are driving in a lane marked with these broken lines, be prepared to exit the freeway or for the lane to end.

hasPart.text: Orange-colored signs indicate construction areas. Proceed with caution.

comment.text: There is roadwork ahead.
You must change lanes ahead.
There is a detour ahead.
There is roadwork ahead.

answerExplanation.text: Orange-colored signs indicate construction areas. Proceed with caution.
